member.name: T:Sahassa.eStatement.Data.My.Resources.Resources
member.summary: A strongly-typed resource class, for looking up localized strings, etc.

member.name: P:Sahassa.eStatement.Data.My.Resources.Resources.ResourceManager
member.summary: Returns the cached ResourceManager instance used by this class.

member.name: P:Sahassa.eStatement.Data.My.Resources.Resources.Culture
member.summary: Overrides the current thread's CurrentUICulture property for all resource lookups using this strongly typed resource class.

member.name: F:Sahassa.eStatement.Data.ScheduleItemLoader.ScheduleItem.DailyFrequency
member.summary: Frequency job to start in a day. Occurs Once At: Use this ctor New(ByVal StartingAt As TimeSpan) Occurs Every: Use this ctor New(ByVal StartingAt As TimeSpan, ByVal EndingAt As TimeSpan, ByVal OccursEveryUnit As Integer, ByVal OccursEveryInterval As OccursEveryIntervalEnum)

member.name: M:Sahassa.eStatement.Data.ScheduleItemLoader.ScheduleItem.#ctor(System.Int64,System.String,System.Int32,System.DateTime,System.TimeSpan)
member.summary: To constructs The One-time occurrences schedule. Date and time must be greater than the current date and time.
member.param: A Unique ID for this Configuration.
A Unique Name for this Configuration.
Start date to run the schedule.
Starting time to run schedule with format {HH:mm:ss AM/PM}.

member.name: M:Sahassa.eStatement.Data.ScheduleItemLoader.ScheduleItem.#ctor(System.Int64,System.String,System.Int32,System.TimeSpan,System.DateTime,System.DateTime,System.Int32)
member.summary: To constructs Daily occurrences schedule with Occurs Once At.
member.param: A Unique ID for this Configuration.
A Unique Name for this Configuration.
Start date to run the schedule.
End date of the schedule. Set End Date to MaxDate if no end date is prefered.
Occurss every N days.

member.name: M:Sahassa.eStatement.Data.ScheduleItemLoader.ScheduleItem.#ctor(System.Int64,System.String,System.Int32,Sahassa.Schedules.DailyFrequency,System.DateTime,System.DateTime,System.Int32)
member.summary: To constructs Daily occurrences schedule with Occurs Every set by Daily Frequency.
member.param: A Unique ID for this Configuration.
A Unique Name for this Configuration.
Start date to run the schedule.
End date of the schedule. Set End Date to MaxDate if no end date is prefered.
Occurss every N days.

member.name: M:Sahassa.eStatement.Data.ScheduleItemLoader.ScheduleItem.#ctor(System.Int64,System.String,System.Int32,System.TimeSpan,System.DateTime,System.DateTime,System.Int32,Sahassa.Schedules.WeekOfDayList)
member.summary: To constructs Weekly occurrences schedule on Weekdays with Occurs Once At set StartingAt only.
member.param: A Unique ID for this Configuration.
A Unique Name for this Configuration.
Start date to run the schedule.
End date of the schedule. Set End Date to MaxDate if no end date is prefered.
Occurss every N days.
List of week of days to occurs on weekly schedule.

member.name: M:Sahassa.eStatement.Data.ScheduleItemLoader.ScheduleItem.#ctor(System.Int64,System.String,System.Int32,Sahassa.Schedules.DailyFrequency,System.DateTime,System.DateTime,System.Int32,Sahassa.Schedules.WeekOfDayList)
member.summary: To constructs Weekly occurrences schedule on Weekdays with Occurs Every set by Daily Frequency.
member.param: A Unique ID for this Configuration.
A Unique Name for this Configuration.
Start date to run the schedule.
End date of the schedule. Set End Date to MaxDate if no end date is prefered.
Occurss every N days.

member.name: M:Sahassa.eStatement.Data.ScheduleItemLoader.ScheduleItem.#ctor(System.Int64,System.String,System.Int32,System.TimeSpan,System.DateTime,System.DateTime,System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: To constructs Monthly occurrences schedule on every Nth of month with Occurs Every set by Daily Frequency.
member.param: A Unique ID for this Configuration.
A Unique Name for this Configuration.
Start date to run the schedule.
End date of the schedule. Set End Date to MaxDate if no end date is prefered.
Occurss every N days.
Day Nth to occurs on monthly schedule.

member.name: M:Sahassa.eStatement.Data.ScheduleItemLoader.ScheduleItem.#ctor(System.Int64,System.String,System.Int32,System.TimeSpan,System.DateTime,System.DateTime,System.Int32,Sahassa.Schedules.TheDateRank,Sahassa.Schedules.TheDayOption)
member.summary: To constructs Monthly occurrences schedule on The (Rank i.e. First, Second) day of week (Monday, Weekend) with Occurs Every set by Daily Frequency.
member.param: A Unique ID for this Configuration.
A Unique Name for this Configuration.
Start date to run the schedule.
End date of the schedule. Set End Date to MaxDate if no end date is prefered.
Occurss every N days.
Rank of Day (First, Second) to occurs on monthly schedule.
Day Nth with weekend or weekdays option to occurs on monthly schedule.
